name: Lu's Greenhouse Cleanup
description:
A short box puzzle game made for "My First Game Jam: Winter 2022"

This game contains four short box pushing puzzles and a lot of learning for myself during it's creation. I hope you can at least enjoy some janky box pushing controls for a few minutes! =)

My First Game Jam: Winter 2022 - https://myfirstgamejam.tumblr.com/

Player sprite from Sithjester!
